tweet: By 2025, delivery vans in dense cities like 🇺🇸New York and 🇬🇧London are projected to account for 30% of urban vehicle miles traveled, driving a 45% rise in traffic congestion from 2022 levels.
category: urban traffic growth caused by delivery vans in dense cities
